mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resource_share (resource_id, shared_by, shared_with, permission, status, created_at, updated_at, expires_at) VALUES (#{resourceId}, #{sharedBy}, #{sharedWith}, #{permission}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW(), #{expiresAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE resource_share SET shared_by = #{sharedBy}, shared_with = #{sharedWith}, permission = #{permission}, status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW(), expires_at = #{expiresAt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, resource_id as resourceId, shared_by as sharedBy, shared_with as sharedWith, permission, status, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, expires_at as expiresAt FROM resource_share WHERE id = #{id}
